Started on `r format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")`

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# input for this report: sce1 and sce2
require(cowplot)
```

## Clustering results of merged samples {.tabset}

### Cell clustering without correction

```{r tSNE, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
sce_cbind <- S4Vectors::cbind(sce1, sce2)
sce_cbind <- seuratPreProcess(sce_cbind)

p1 <- TSNEPlot(object=metadata(sce_cbind)$scData, group.by="Plate",
               do.return = TRUE, do.label = TRUE)
p2 <- TSNEPlot(object=metadata(sce_cbind)$scData,
               do.return = TRUE, do.label = TRUE)
p <- plot_grid(p1, p2)

# Coloured by plate/run if available
TSNEPlot(object=scData, group.by="Plate")
```
